query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `smsLogs` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `candidateId` int,
  `phoneNumber` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `message` text NOT NULL,
  `provider` enum('twilio','aws_sns','custom') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'twilio',
  `messageId` varchar(255),
  `status` enum('pending','queued','sent','delivered','failed','undelivered') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `deliveredAt` timestamp,
  `failedAt` timestamp,
  `failureReason` text,
  `cost` bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `segments` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `direction` enum('outbound','inbound') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'outbound',
  `purpose` enum('interview_reminder','status_update','notification','marketing','verification','other') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'other',
  `campaignId` int,
  `metadata` json,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (`userId`) REFERENCES `users`(`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (`candidateId`) REFERENCES `candidates`(`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL,
  INDEX `userId_idx` (`userId`),
  INDEX `candidateId_idx` (`candidateId`),
  INDEX `status_idx` (`status`),
  INDEX `createdAt_idx` (`createdAt`),
  INDEX `provider_idx` (`provider`),
  INDEX `purpose_idx` (`purpose`)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3HwZw1vuDqLodBY.root --database hjcHA4SjAwhM6aP28vcAkH --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `smsLogs` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,

  `direction` enum('outbound','inbound') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'outbound',
  `purpose` enum('interview_reminder','status_update','notification','marketing','verification','other') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'other',
  `campaignId` int,
  `metadata` json,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (`userId`) REFERENCES `users`(`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (`candidateId`) REFERENCES `candidates`(`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL,
  INDEX `userId_idx` (`userId`),
  INDEX `candidateId_idx` (`candidateId`),
  INDEX `status_idx` (`status`),
  INDEX `createdAt_idx` (`createdAt`),

  INDEX `purpose_idx` (`purpose`)
)
